QuestData.Title: A Message From Ly'leth
QuestData.Description:
The arcan'dor bears fruit once again. Just in time, too - Ly'leth has sent us a message, and it seems she may have a lead on Vanthir. He is long overdue for this gift, assuming we manage to find him.
Give a fruit to another citizen here in Shal'Aran while I finish decrypting Ly'leth's message.
QuestData.LogDescription: Feed the Fruit of the Arcan'dor to a Suramar Refugee in Shal'Aran.
QuestData.RewardText: There. I certainly hope Ly'leth has good news...
